Title: Inside Windows Security from client to cloud | BRK258
Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
The latest innovations across Windowsâ€”from client to cloudâ€”are designed to improve your security posture and protect users, devices and data. Join this session to learn about the newest security capabilities across Windows 11 and Windows 365 to protect users and data, including features like password and identity management, protecting against malware, hotpatching, hardware updates and more. We will also discuss how Cloud PC devices like Windows 365 Link are changing the game in Windows endpoints.
